text: 2|240|Ara tomadera madhye jara mara yabe ebam stri rekhe yabe, tara yena tadera strike tadera ghara theke bera na kare tadera eka bacharera bharana-posanera asiyata kare [1]. Kintu yadi tara bera haye yaya, tabe bidhimata nijedera mata tara ya karabe tate tomadera kono papa ne'i. Ara allahâ€Œ prabala parakranta, prajnamaya.
